sn32.3-12:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn32.3-12:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana sitavalahakanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti?
sn32.3-12:1.4: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kayena sucaritam carati, vacaya sucaritam carati, manasa sucaritam carati.
sn32.3-12:1.8: ‘aho vataham kayassa bheda param marana sitavalahakanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn32.3-12:1.11: So kayassa bheda param marana sitavalahakanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati.
sn32.3-12:1.12: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana sitavalahakanam devanam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
